'''Radiant Spincrystal 145''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Bells in Bloom]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located to the south-west of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] near the coast of [[Tezcatepetonco Range]].
